divs: Sighting DetailsMy 21 year old daughter asked if she was seeing a plane. I got up and grabbed the camera as I went. I looked up and saw it as it went over our house! It was heading South, a round red light that flashed a small white light near the bottom. It was moving slower than a plane, even in the dark sky we could see it was round. It curved in the sky, and I ran out to our backyard but it was hugging the treeline and made a photo impossible. I saw it heading back toward the North before I could no longer see it. Took three photos but they show nothing viewable. I will save them and send them in if requested. Two people witnessed this event.
Summary: Red, silent orb with single flashing light curved from North and went in an arc back to the North
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Auburn
There were no other sightings in Auburn on or around August 4th 2009
